title: 128: Antonio Gramsci
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Antonio Gramsci was a Marxist, and we see some of his theories finding purchase today. Don't worry, we don't really get political, but we do discuss the ideas themselves.
itunes:author: The Proletariat
itunes:subtitle: It's all just a class struggle (not different from my English class, I guess)
itunes:summary: Antonio Gramsci was a Marxist, and we see some of his theories finding purchase today. Don't worry, we don't really get political, but we do discuss the ideas themselves.
